entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
